---
title: "View documentation guidelines"
date: last-modified
---

View the guidelines for model documentation associated with a template to ensure that you are compliant with documentation requirements.

::: {.prereq}

## Prerequisites

- [x] {{< var link.login >}}
- [x] The model you are documenting is registered in the model inventory.[^1]
- [x] Model documentation has already been created for this model.[^2]
- [x] A model developer has started generating documentation, either using the {{< var validmind.developer >}}[^3] or via the online editor in the {{< var validmind.platform >}}.
- [x] You are a `Developer` or assigned another role with sufficient permissions to perform the tasks in this guide.[^4]

::: {.callout title="To configure documentation guidelines for templates, you must have sufficient guideline permissions."}
By default, the `Customer Admin` role has these permissions.
:::


:::

## Steps

1. In the left sidebar, click **Model Inventory**.

2. Select a model by clicking on it or find your model by applying a filter or searching for it.[^5]

3. In the left sidebar that appears for your model, click **Documentation**.

4. In any section of the documentation for a model, click **ValidMind Insights™** in the top right corner to expand the **ValidMind Insights™** sidebar.

   **Documentation Guidelines** are shown for each document section, associated with the template configured by your model validation team.
